name: TheAtlantic
text: Saint John the Apostle wrote that "perfect love drives out fear," and neurobiological evidence suggests that's true. For "How to Build a Life," @arthurbrooks argues that when we feel afraid, the answer is to seek out love. https://t.co/K1oYZhuq8X

name: TheAtlantic
text: The grim effects of Trump’s wayward whims have turned Americans into a nation of armchair psychologists, struggling to understand the workings of one particular psyche, @megangarber writes: https://t.co/4UUZ1OY9c4

name: TheAtlantic
text: Laura Ingraham’s dark pessimism, with its echoes of the most radical left- and right-wing movements in American political history, helps explain how she became, long before many others, a convinced supporter of Donald Trump. @anneapplebaum reports: https://t.co/AozlxJivEf

name: TheAtlantic
text: 75 years ago, the first nuclear bomb was detonated in the New Mexico desert. @ibogost revisits the desolate memorial to the moment that ignited America’s future: https://t.co/nexHTZdS1n

name: TheAtlantic
text: Listen to @olgakhazan explain how nursing homes came to account for over 40% of U.S. coronavirus deaths: https://t.co/dYKPlk86Ft

name: TheAtlantic
text: .@jameshamblin & @katlwells talk through the latest on how we get to herd immunity: https://t.co/AJJqefbkOW

name: TheAtlantic
text: A first-in-the-nation law in Colorado aimed at police accountability has activists celebrating and officers worrying, @russellberman reports: https://t.co/Jw4NG3GhSe

name: TheAtlantic
text: “We now have the technology to make periods optional.” Menstruation is becoming an elective bodily process, writes @MarionRenault: https://t.co/vNDjYvJjL2

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Courage in the public square is very rarely about unearthing an epic wrong and seeking to right it; finding a pit of dastardliness and uncovering it for all to see," @EliotACohen writes: https://t.co/dYgDqGUdb7

name: TheAtlantic
text: Donald Trump's failure to contain the pandemic is forcing schools to stay closed for the fall, even as the president demands that they reopen, writes @GrahamDavidA: https://t.co/59nn67FWLN

name: TheAtlantic
text: Two of our writers discuss the fallout so far—and detail the scary consequences still to come. The latest Atlantic Daily: https://t.co/8OqQiWcBI1

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Solving an economic crisis like the one the U.S. faces requires both a clear-eyed diagnosis of the problem and a commitment to cushioning the blow for communities, small businesses, and workers," @jleibenluft writes: https://t.co/kOlZKhI6xP

name: TheAtlantic
text: Photos of the Week: Noble Deer, Deadman's Reef, Buffalo Float—via @TheAtlPhoto: https://t.co/ckomDsm6Ob

name: TheAtlantic
text: "I'm going to be the kind of congressperson where I’m going to be at rallies with the people, fighting for justice and being present," Jamaal Bowman, whom the Associated Press has said defeated incumbent Democrat Eliot Engel, told @IsaacDovere: https://t.co/Mp4Ow51piX
